Restaurant El Yate in Madrid, under new owners since May 2014. We offer economic daily set meal (lunch), a la carte menu (lunch & dinner) and special weekend set meal. Moreover we have a menu of typical spanish tapas, pinchos & salads which you will can try all our specialties at any time. In the restaurant El Yate, you will can enjoy our terrace all day and free wi-fi. We remain open until after midnight with a great environment, premium drinks, wine list, good beer and cocktails.

Paseo General Martínez Campos 41

91 319 10 37

info@elyatemadrid.es
